name: 2024 8th International Conference on Sustainable Tourism Management
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted and presented papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published into the ICAEB 2024 post-proceedings as a workshop of 2024 8th International Conference on Applied Economics and Business Conference proceedings (ICAEB2024), which will be indexed by Scopus, Google Scholar, etc. Some selected papers can be recommended to Journal of Advanced Management Science for possible publication after being extended, which will be indexed by Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, Electronic Journals Digital Library, etc.
